entities.name: students
entities.description: The students are the main characters in the story who are observing Professor Lupin.

entities.name: witch
entities.description: The witch is a minor character who pushes the food cart and has been seen by the students before.

entities.name: stranger
entities.description: The stranger is Professor Lupin, a wizard who looks ill and exhausted.

entities.name: wizard
entities.description: Professor Lupin is wearing a set of wizard's robes, indicating that he is a wizard.

relationships.description: The students have seen the witch before.
The students are observing Professor Lupin, who is introduced as a stranger.
The witch is pushing the food cart.
Professor Lupin is wearing a set of wizard's robes.
